data_descriptor.name: office_arrival_time
data_descriptor.description: Office arrival time (entering time into the office location) according to gps location model

data_descriptor.name: verdict
data_descriptor.description: Analysis of the arrival time which is one of the three verdict: 1. before_expected_conservative_time 2. after_expected_conservative_time 3. in_expected_conservative_time. Expected conservative time is the before_hour time of average arrival time. For example if average arrival time is 8:15 then expected conservative time is 8:00 on the other hand if average arrival time is 8:37 then expected conservative time is 8:30. The arrival time which are earlier than expected conservative time are labeled before_expected_conservative_time and the arrival time which are later than expected conservative time are labeled as after_expected_conservative_time, the arrival time which are exactly same as the expected conservative time are labeled as in_expected_conservative_time.

data_descriptor.name: deviation
data_descriptor.description: How much deviated from the expected conservative time (in minutes).

algorithm.description: Expected conservative office arrival time with verdict of before, after or in expected conservative arrival time. Ff 9:15 is the actual arrival time then 9:00 is the expected conservative arrival time. Sample is a list with three elements as follows: 0 - Office arrival time, 1 - verdict (after_expected_conservative_time, before_expected_conservative_time, in_expected_conservative_time), 2 - deviation from the expected conservative time in minutes.
